goal_descEN: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
target_descEN: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
indicator_descEN: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
seriesDescription: Number of missing persons due to disaster (number)
footnotes: Disclaimer: the data being submitted by UNISDR has been extracted from two sources: (a) the Sendai Framework Monitoring System as provided by designated national focal points; and (b) Desinventar disaster loss databases. Some of the data has not finalized an official validation process and may be subject to revision at a later date.â
sources: United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction (2019)
